metadata.title: CVE-2024-36041 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
[ksmserver: Unauthorized users can access session manager]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36041` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcolorcorrect5 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
libkworkspace5-5 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
libnotificationmanager1 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
libplasma-geolocation-interface5 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
libtaskmanager6 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
libweather-ion7 - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
plasma-workspace - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
plasma-workspace-wayland - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
sddm-theme-breeze - 4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: plasma-workspace package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4:5.18.8-0ubuntu0.2').
